StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetRecruiterByProspectID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ProspectID uniqueidentifier
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT RTrim(rp.Rank_Code) as RankCode, RTrim(p.Last_Name) as LastName, RTrim(p.First_Name) as FirstName, RTrim(p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME) as MiddleName, rp.rowguid as RecruiterID FROM USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngPerson rp, USMC.vwMcrissPerson p, Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect prosp
WHERE rp.Recrui.ng_Person_ID = p.Person_ID AND rp.rowguid = prosp.Recrui.ngPersonId AND ProspectId = @ProspectID
END
